thread.title: Great but crowdy!
thread.title_full: Great but crowdy! - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Bruna S
title: Great but crowdy!
text: Very nice hotel, very crowd but thats NYC! It has a great breakfats, great bar, live music at night, a nice place next door, call The KItchen, were u can have lunch or dinner for good money. The rooms are very clean and beds are very confortable. I didn´t like too much the area, it´s very touristy, I prefer Union Square, but still, it´s a very nice hotel, and u will never get bored here!
